<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/helium/l1/accounts"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the list of Helium L1 blockchain accounts with optional filtering by address. Requires the HotspotData feature.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"address","description":"Filter by account address."},{"schema":{"type":"integer"},"in":"query","name":"page","description":"Page number for pagination (default: 1)."},{"schema":{"type":"integer"},"in":"query","name":"per_page","description":"Number of items per page (default: 25, max: 100)."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
